name: moimiOLD
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w1, w0)), wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w1, w0)), wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w1, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w1, w0)), wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1))
-| wi(w1, w0)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ moimi as of 9-May-2023. The at-most-one quantifier reverses implication. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2006.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
